PAD_ShadowCurseNotLifted.synopsis: If the shadow curse wasn't lifted, the party will remark that we still need protection against the curse despite Ketheric having been defeated.
PAD_ShadowCurseNotLifted.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use "oe SCE_SetupDebrief" or use the debugbook to go to act 2 region "Epilogue".- Enter the trigger S_SCE_PartyVB_ShadowCurseNotLifted_Trigger_501ae20e-9ef9-435e-8d13-860fa434d056 on the bridge from Moonrise to the town, at the Moonrise waypoint.

PAD_ToBaldursGate.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use "oe SCE_SetupDebrief" or use the debugbook to go to act 2 region "Epilogue".- Enter the trigger S_SCE_PartyVB_ToBaldursGate_Trigger_9013deb2-3947-4999-9204-d42cffcbf11a outside of the throne room

PAD_ShadowCurseNotLifted_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ShadowCurseNotLifted_0.text: Ketheric may be gone, but the shadows remain. On our guard.
PAD_ShadowCurseNotLifted_0.context: NodeContext: SH: 'the shadow curse remains' = SH has abandoned Shar. 'Lady Shar's power persists' = SH loyal to shar.

PAD_ToBaldursGate_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ToBaldursGate_0.text: The road to Baldur's Gate is west of the town. If we hurry, we'll arrive before the Absolute's forces.

PAD_UnfinishedBusiness_0.speaker: Player
PAD_UnfinishedBusiness_0.text: The road to Baldur's Gate is up ahead. No turning back, once we start down that road.

PAD_CurseStateComment_0.speaker: Player
PAD_CurseStateComment_0.text: The shadow curse will soon be forgotten, thanks to us.

PAD_CurseStateComment_1.speaker: Player
PAD_CurseStateComment_1.text: Lady Shar's embrace holds strong. She will be pleased, no doubt.

PAD_CurseStateComment_2.speaker: Player
PAD_CurseStateComment_2.text: The shadow curse still taints the land. Perhaps we could have lifted it, had we tried.

PAD_CurseStateComment_3.speaker: Player
PAD_CurseStateComment_3.text: Now these lands are free of Shar. I hope I can say the same of myself, soon enough.

PAD_CurseStateComment_4.speaker: Player
PAD_CurseStateComment_4.text: The shadow curse persists. A shame we could not lift it... but we have to move on.

PAD_CurseStateComment_5.speaker: Player
PAD_CurseStateComment_5.text: Lady Shar's embrace has been lifted from these lands. A necessary sacrifice, to stop that traitor, Thorm.
